name: Rogue Wumpus
description:
Rogue Wumpus is a turned game when you need escape the levels, each level is aleatory generate. the player dont know what have in the rooms, but in the adjacent rooms the game give tips about what have in these rooms. imagine the Minesweeper game, player needs use these info to cross the levels more safely.

This was my third jam and the second that e "finish". The game have some bugs that i didn't have time to fix them, in this jam i learning about procedural level generation and turned-based game.

i just wish i had time to polish the game and introduce the player, but  it's part of the game.

Controls:  

(W, A, S, D) to move.

(Left Mouse Click) to do actions. (attack spiders, active lever , enter the gate to next level);
